# Description
This project aims to automate tests for web and mobile applications using the WebdriverIO test automation tool. WebdriverIO is a browser and mobile test automation library, based on Node.js, that uses the WebDriver API to programmatically interact with browsers and devices.

# Requirement
- [Nodejs] ^16.15.0
- NPM ^8.5.5

[Nodejs]: https://nodejs.org/en/

## Dependencies used
| Name           | Version |
|----------------|---------|
| [webdriverio]     | 4.8.9   |

[Selenium]: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.seleniumhq.selenium/selenium-java/4.4.0
[Testng]: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.testng/testng
[Rest Assured]: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.rest-assured/rest-assured


## Supported browsers
| Browser | OS                    |
|---------|-----------------------|
| Chrome  | Windows, Linux, MacOS |

# Instalation
To install, follow the steps below:

1. Clone the repository from GitHub:
    ```bash
    git clone git@github.com:angelleoneltorrelopez/webdriverio-template.git
    ```
2. Install the project dependencies using the package manager:
    ```bash
    npm install
    ```

# Use
To use the software, follow the steps below:

## Run test suite
```bash
npm run test
```

## Generate and show report
```bash
npm run report
```

If you have questions or comments about this project, please contact me at angelleoneltorrelopez@gmail.com. 
Thank you for using this software!
